name: The Redder planet
description:
A game for the 52nd Ludum Dare. Made by me and my friend, who made all art, and the music of the game! If you find any game breaking bugs, tell me right away!

Important!

Download the *original* version if you want to rate this game on the Ludum Dare Site. The hotfix version was made *after* the deadline!

We uploaded a hotfix version, for those who'd just like to play the game and have fun.
